title: Saimin Jutsu The Animation 2nd
synopsis: Susumu is negative and introverted. He is just living a vacant life, always been reprimanded by his mother and never resisting it. All that changed the day he met a certain person that just moved to the Condo he and his mother live in, that would bring a dramatic change in his life...he is been taught hypnotism!!
characters: ['Takase, Shino', 'Sakurai, Sawa', 'Sakurai, Susumu', 'Takase, Noriko', 'Sakurai, Susumu', 'Kasaya, Yoko', 'Murakoshi, Shinta', 'Yuiko, Rie']
